column2: an A.M. Eatery////The memorable service lured me back for a second visit. The service wasn't as impressive as Katrina's
column3: but it was fine. I had the Breakfast Pot Pie with a sunny side up egg this time and didn't enjoy it as much as I thought I would. The flavors were bland
column4: but the crust was perfectly flaky. It was definitely filling
column5: and I had to bring home the leftovers. I also ordered the pancake of the day for dessert
column6: which I believe was a blueberry Danish pancake. It was delicious!
